thread.title: NC child porn investigation leads to South Africa arrests
thread.title_full: NC child porn investigation leads to South Africa arrests

title: NC child porn investigation leads to South Africa arrests
text:
NC child porn investigation leads to South Africa arrests 
Posted 4:28 p.m. yesterday Your friends e-mail addresses (comma separated): * Subject: * Are you human? * You must enter the characters with black color that stand out from the other characters 
RALEIGH, N.C. â€” Authorities say a child pornography investigation in North Carolina led to the arrests of the parents of a 14-year-old girl in South Africa. 
The State Bureau of Investigation said in a news release that the investigation started with a Catawba County man found with child pornography. 
The SBI says they found evidence on his cellphone he was paying for graphic pictures of a teen from South Africa. 
Investigators in that country traced the payments to an address in Port Elizabeth and talked to a 14-year-old girl, who said her parents were sexually assaulting her and taking pictures and video. 
South African authorities say the parents have been charged and the girl and her two brothers removed from their care.
